ConfigurationSnippets.SchoolProfileConfigurationSnippet: <SchoolProfile SchoolName="{SchoolName}" SchoolId="{SchoolId}" CourseLoad="8"> <DisciplineProfile AverageEventsPerStudentPerDay="0.01" RateOfSeriousEvents="0.015" /> <SchoolAttendanceProfile AverageAttendanceRate="0.93" AverageTardyRate="0.01" /> {GradeProfile} <StaffProfile> <StaffRaceConfiguration> <Option Value="White" Frequency="0.49" /> <Option Value="Hispanic" Frequency="0.29" /> <Option Value="Black" Frequency="0.16" /> <Option Value="Asian" Frequency="0.06" /> </StaffRaceConfiguration> <StaffSexConfiguration> <Option Value="Male" Frequency="0.24" /> <Option Value="Female" Frequency="0.76" /> </StaffSexConfiguration> </StaffProfile> </SchoolProfile>
